doc:
Chris Owen (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chris_Owen_(actor) 0 Chris Owen (born September 25, 1980) is an American actor and photographer. He is best known for his role as Chuck Sherman, a.k.a.The Sherminator in the American Pie film franchise, appearing in American Pie, American Pie 2, American Pie Presents: Band Camp and American Reunion. Aside from Eugene Levy, he is the only actor from the theatrical features to appear in the "American Pie Presents:" direct-to-video spin-off movies. Chris_Owen ( born September_25_,_1980 ) is an_American_actor and photographer . He is_best_known for his_role as Chuck_Sherman , a.k.a.The_Sherminator in the_American_Pie_film_franchise , appearing in American_Pie , American_Pie_2 , American_Pie Presents : Band_Camp and American_Reunion . Aside from Eugene_Levy , he is the_only_actor from the_theatrical_features to_appear in the_"_American_Pie Presents : " direct-to-video_spin-off_movies .
